name: Testspeed
giudizio2:
You really thought I wouldn't say hi during such an important event like AGDQ?\|
How cute.\|\.
giudizio3: The crowd is absurdly adorable today. \.I would blow a kiss to you all if only I had the animation for it!
giudizio4: Don't get me wrong:\. I'll still do what I can to stop you. \.A slight mistake in the final fight can still cost you the run.
giudizio5: Now, let's pretend this never happened and let's return to the game's script-
